categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Brin was a Human female lieutenant in the Imperial Army who served during the Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Following the Empire's defeat at the Battle of Corellia, Brin was among the Imperial forces that remained on the planet Corellia to secure the Black Hole refinery region, and was stationed at Horizon Outpost.

Lieutenant Brin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Classic Gear Vendor for the Imperial faction in the Black Hole Daily Area, which was added in Game Update 1.2: Legacy on April 12, 2012.
